meanings.sent1: I need to retaping the box to make sure it stays closed.
meanings.sent2: She is retaping the poster to the wall after it fell down.
meanings.sent3: After the cat played with the tape, I had to retaping everything!
meanings.sent4: His heart felt like it needed retaping after the breakup.
meanings.sent5: The sound of retaping echoed through the room.

meanings.definition: The act of applying tape again.
meanings.sent1: The retaping of the package made it more secure.
meanings.sent2: I ran out of tape due to all the retaping I had to do.
meanings.sent3: The retaping process seemed never-ending with all the boxes.
meanings.sent4: Her retaping skills were unmatched in the office.
meanings.sent5: The retaping was a tedious but necessary task.
